attributes.action: demand that all restaurants, food and bars, within the Houses of Parliament, cease to be subsidised.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition aims to demand that the Government withdraws the massive subsidies, paid by the taxpayer, towards MPs food and drink within the Houses of Parliament.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
